dregsmod:AdaptabilityPower.NAME: Adaptability
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Curse, gain #b

dregsmod:AsylumPower.NAME: Asylum
DESCRIPTIONS: to Seal. You heal equal to its energy cost.

dregsmod:ChaosTheoryPower.NAME: Chaos Theory
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a copy of a random card from your master deck to your hand each turn.

dregsmod:CursedPower.NAME: Cursed
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy heals 10% of its missing HP at the start of its turn. If #yCursed exceeds its HP, it will be killed and transformed into a curse.

dregsmod:DefiancePower.NAME: Defiance
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are inflicted with #yWeak, #yFrail, or #yVulnerable, gain #b

dregsmod:EclipseFormPower.NAME: Eclipse Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Unplayable curse cards can be played. When played, gain #b

dregsmod:IncantationPower.NAME: Incantation
DESCRIPTIONS: The first enemy you damage each turn is inflicted with #b

dregsmod:FortitudePower.NAME: Fortitude
DESCRIPTIONS: Opposite of #yVulnerable. Take 25% less damage for #b

dregsmod:MightPower.NAME: Might
DESCRIPTIONS: Opposite of #yWeak. Your attacks deal 25% more damage for #b

dregsmod:RetributionPower.NAME: Retribution
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, your next attack deals #b

dregsmod:SturdinessPower.NAME: Sturdiness
DESCRIPTIONS: Opposite of #yFrail. You gain 25% more Block from cards for #b
